content:
Unarvverum naathhaa!-unarvarullkanuthaapatthinnaayu
Kanye! Vimale! Ninpraarththhana kottayathaakenam
Nibishleehanmaare! Praarththhana kottayathaakenam
Guruthaathanmaare! Praarththhana kottayathaakenam

Karunaa saagarame! Satthamathanayaa! Kaniyenam
Vishvaasikallaakum mrtharaarjikkanamaashvaasam

Lokam rakshippaanekan-
Suthanavathaaram cheyyumpoll
Maathaavaayu kanyaa-mariyaamineyette-
Nnoru lekhanamezhuthitthaathan
Vittaan doothane nasretthil

Kanyakapettaallalbhuthane-
Avane varin parishodhikkaam
Thalamurakallkkaadyan-keeratthunichutti
Pauraanikanaam vrddhaneyaa-kkanyaka prasavichu.
Malakalleyentum balavaane-baalika laallichu
/tappam deenarkkekunnon
/tsthanyam shishupol nukarunnu
Aadiyezhaatthonaam soonu-
Aadiyezhaanishdam poondu
Avasaanaviheenan-jananatthinnetthi

Mohanasundaranaamangall na
Lkee poorvvika neethijnyar
Kanyakadaaveedin-makall mariyaaminnaayu
Poottiya vaathilithennevam-haskkeeyelothi
Poottiyathottamadachoroo-ttennevam shlemoon
/tpuriyennevam daaveedum
/tjaathikallepposhippippaan
Vitthillaathe mullachorunal
Sasyam thaan mshihaanaathhan
Thalsmrthi maanichaan-oozhiyilum melum

Dhanye! Nin praarththhanamevatte nyangallodonni-
Charththhanakettittekeedatte punyam naathhan

Kanyakamariyaam praarththhikkumpolleerayanetthi
Daivatthaale prekshithamaakum shlomo nalki
Shlomo chonnitteritheemayanaam doothan chonnaan
Kanyaathvatthil neeyaathmajane prasavichidum

Shobhaapoornne! Pedikkendaa thaathan ninnil
Preethippettaanekasuthan than maathaavaakaan
inneram nee vismayamerum garbham peri
shaashvatharaajyam vaazhum prajaye prasavichidum

Ompathumaasam ninneyettoll than praarththhanayaal
daivaathmajane! Kopatthil dandaazhivaakkenam

Sahadaakaadeeshanmaare!
Lokasahaayatthinnuravaayu
/tveeryam ningallthan-asthhikkaayu thannon
Dhanyan naathhangkal ningall
Nyangallkkaayu praarththhikkenam.

Sathyatthe snehichore!
Puthranuvendi marichore!
Satthamare! Vaazhvaam-ningall thannormma
Anuthaapamezhum paapikall than thuramukhamaayu ningall
Ningallilamarum mashihaayaam-naathhanodarththhippin
/tthannaagamanadine krpayum
/tvaazhvum nyangallkkarulleedaan
Daivikapeedhatthinte mumpil
Mukhathejassodee nyangall
Raapakalennennum-sthothram paadeedum

Haa! Bahumohana naadatthaal
Evangelonil naathhan
Kalppichaan priyaraam uthsaahikallodaayu
Aathmadaridranmaar dhanyar-svarppuramaarjikkum
Vilapichamarunnordhanyar-nedidumaashvaasam
/tpeedaardditharum dhanyanmaar
/thatharaam sahaderum dhanyar
Peedaykkum yaathanakallkkum
Prathiphalamaayivaraarjikkum
Svargatthodoppam-shvaashvathamaam jeevan

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Nin vrtthaantam roohaayaal
Chonnoraam nibi shleehanmaar
snehaal mrtharaam sahadenmaar
praarththhikkum krpacheyyenam

Kartthaavinnishdam cheythaar
Nirmmalare! Praarththhicheeduvin
nyangallil ninnum neengeedaan
kopatthinnadiyum dandum

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Naathhaa! Vigatharkkekaname
nin shobhanabhavanaashvaasam
/tthettukalle neekki-mochanamekaname
Nyangallkkum vigathanmaarkkum
Kartthaave! Karunaapoorvvam

Pethgomo-kartthaave! Nalkaashvaasam
Uththhaanatthinnaallollam
Thaalkkaalikamaamijeevan
Vittapithaakkallkkum-bhaathyajanangallkkum
Kaantiyezhunnarakallkkullllil nalkeedaashvaasam
Avareyorkkunnaallkabarullllasthhikallariyenam
/tninkalppana manmayaraamaa-
/tdaamyarkkuyirekeedumpoll
Kaantiyaninyittavar ninno-
Doppam manavarayil pooki
Uyirekum ninne sthothram cheyyenam

Aarkkaayu kaazhchakallivideyanaykkunno bhaagyamavannettam
Melsvargatthilava-nnormmayathundaakum
Gothrapperukallormmaykkaay-kartthaavin mumpil
Kaanmaan kallukallil mosha
Kotthiyathorkkumpoll
/tningallthan mrthar perukalle
/torkkaanum palllliyilivide
Ezhuthaanum melsvargatthil
Mashihaathan varavil thanno-
Davarmodippaanum-cherppin pristhaayil

Nayavaan panapole thallirtthidume - haa
Vallarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol
Vrddhathayilumavar thallirittu thazhachidume - haa…
Varddhikkumavarkku thushdipushdikallum -

Maartthommaa! Ninsmrthi bhoomiyilum
Vaanilumaaghoshikkunnu
Bhoomithale marthyarumaakaashe-
Vaanavarum modikkunnu
/tninporaattatthe nokki
/tkartthaavaahlaadikkunnu
/tsadbhadane! Shvaashvatharaajyam
Vannavakaashikkennevam-
Ninnodeeshan kalpikkum

Maarthommaa makudamaninyappoll
Vaaneenneerenmaaretthi
Chuttum ninnevam ghoshichaar
Por niravettiya nee dhanyan
/taamodatthodirenmaar
/tninne nokkippaarkkunnu
/tthaathasuthanmaar kaikkollllum
Ninpaavanamaam sheershatthil
Aniyikkum makudam roohaa

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Maathrvishuddha praarththhanayaal
Punyam nyangallkkum vaangi-
Ppoyorkkum nalkeedenam

Mariyaaminnaayu shlommova-
Nnariyichoraamaalaakhaa
Daivam yojippaayennaayu
Vannarivingekeedenam

Panineer haananiyaadyarmel
Veezhtthiyoraa maalaakhaa than
Mrthar thannasthhikkoottatthil
Krpayaam neer veezhttheedenam

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Maathrvishuddha praarththhanayaal
Punyam nyangallkkum vaangi-
Ppoyorkkum nalkeedenam.
